TextEng: "Do you know the Reaper's True Name?"
"I'm trying to learn the Five-Fold Mysteries of the Sleeping Man."
"Look, can you help me with the mysteries or not?"
"What kind of tussle are we talking about?"
"It's a matter of convenience, that's all."
"It's not mumbo-jumbo. It's a matter of faith."
"Please, I must learn the Five-Fold Mysteries."
"How did you figure out the mystery?"
"Have you ever asked the Knower of Places anything?"
"How long have you been traveling with them?"
"How did you figure out the mystery?"
"Have you ever asked the Knower of Places anything?"
"How did you plan to wake the Sleeping Man?"
"I just need to find a way out of Cania."
"How did you plan to wake the Sleeping Man?"
"That chip in your horn must be pretty recent."
Text: "뿔에 난 그 흠집은 꽤 최근에 생긴 것 같은데."

TextEng: "What kind of tussle are we talking about?"
"How did you plan to wake the Sleeping Man?"
"Not right now. I've still got a few questions."
Text: "지금은 안 돼. 아직 몇 가지 질문이 더 있어."

TextEng: "Could you repeat the rules for me?"
"Sure, I'll let you know when my ante's on the table."
"Enough questions. I want to guess the card."
"Does it belong to the suit of..."
"Fine. I'll let you know when I've changed my ante."
"Getting scared, old man? Go ahead, pick a card."
"I know the rules. I'll let you know when my ante's on the table."
"So, about your plans to wake the Sleeping Man..."
"Write an epic song about me and sing it throughout the planes."
Text: "나에 대한 장엄한 노래를 써서 차원들 전체에서 불러."

TextEng: "I want you to start a fight with the tavernkeeper."
"Tell me a little more about this trumpet."
